content:

thought: The first step in crafting a dark_oak_boat is to craft dark_oak_planks. Dark oak planks require one of four different types of wood. In this case, we have a stripped_dark_oak_log, so we will use that. To begin crafting, we must move the log to the crafting grid, so we will move it from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: The first step in crafting a dark oak boat is to craft dark oak planks. The first step in crafting dark oak planks is to move the stripped dark oak log from slot 32 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
